text: The Third Part of the Night () is a 1971 Polish World War II psychological horror drama movie directed by first time director Andrzej Żuławski. It starred Małgorzata Braunek, Leszek Teleszyński, Michał Grudziński, Jan Nowicki, Leszek Długosz and Marek Walczewski. ==Other websites== * * Category:1971 drama movies Category:1971 horror movies Category:1971 war movies Category:1970s psychological movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:Polish horror movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Andrzej Żuławski Category:Movies set in Poland Category:Movies about fascists Category:Movies about Catholicism Category:Movies about Nazism Category:Movies about philosophy
title: The Third Part of the Night
